context: Which languages does it have? Is Spanish included?

To play in Spanish, first you would need to make sure your system language is set to Spanish in System Settings on your 3DS console (or 3DS XL, 2DS, whichever console you have). Then, the game will automatically switch to Spanish.

context: do i need game controller to play or can i use a keyboard
response: As with most pc games these days, either will do.  I've found having a game controller helpful in general, but not usually necessary.  Good luck.

context: How long does the back light stay on? Can you customize it?
response: Stays on unless you cut it off. You can change the color of the backlight to whatever you wish. Three presets. Cannot change color of individual keys.

context: Is this just another graphical showcase like Ryse was for the X1 or is there an actual game hidden in here?

context: does it have rapid fire for the ballista and dsr 50 from black ops 2
response: Yes it does but it doesn't fire rapidly if you hold down the trigger it will fire after the bullet cock's back into the chamber. You do not have to keep pressing the trigger, just spot your enemy and hold down the trigger.

context: I have a SteelSeries 4HD mouse pad,would this work well with a plastic coated pad? I currently have a Naos 5000 that's getting worn out.
response: Yes, the Corsair M95 will work perfectly on most surfaces. After you download software for the M95 off the Corsair website, you can run a test and the M95 will detect the quality of the mouse mat. That will make the mouse be able to be more accurate on the mouse mat you are using.

context: can i play these with just 1 hand (the mouse)?
response: Yes you can. But still have the option to use letter and numbers keys and sometimes it makes it easier. For example, when you want to give someone $250, you would have to click the up arrow 250 times unless you type in "250". This is the only time I really used the keyboard rather than the mouse.

context: does this flight stick work with all other flying games on xbox 360?
